9AHN.SG.summary: AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of automobile parts, dies, and jigs in Thailand, China, Malaysia, and Portugal. It operates in three segments: Manufacture of Auto Parts; Sales of Automobiles and Provision of Automobiles Repair Service; and Others. The company offers stamped or pressed parts, including chassis frame components, housing axles parts, pressed and stamped body parts, door check link, and brake lines, fuel lines, engine, and brazing parts; forged and machined parts, such as transmission, power train, steering and suspension systems, engine, shafts, wheel hubs, and other parts, as well as connecting rods and copper forged parts; and plastic parts and plastic fuel tanks. It also provides roof ditch mouldings, belt line mouldings, door sash products, brazed steel tubing, door checks and hinges, and parking brake lever products; assembly jigs; and stamping dies. In addition, the company is involved in the sale of automobiles; provision of automobile repair, training, technical support, and information technology consulting and advisory services; venture capital business; investment in other companies; and import and export of vehicles and parts. Further, it manufactures 3D car navigation and digital map solutions under the POWERMAP brand with voice activation software, as well as Oracle ERP systems; and operates car dealership service centers. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

ACG-R.BK.summary: Autocorp Holding Public Company Limited, a dealer, distributes cars and spare parts in Thailand. It also offers car leasing and insurance services; and maintenance, repair, and after sale services. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

AJ-R.BK.summary: A.J. Plast Public Company Limited manufactures, sells, and exports plastic films and scrap products in Thailand and internationally. It offers biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP), biaxially oriented polyester (BOPET), biaxially oriented polyamide (BOPA), biaxially oriented poly lactic acid (BOPLA), and cast polypropylene (CPP) films, as well as metallized BOPP, BOPET, BOPA, BOPLA, and CPP films; and Krystalox and Krystalent films. The company's products are primarily used in printed and flexible packaging, industrial, lamination and adhesive tape, and wrapping applications. A.J. Plast Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Asia Hotel Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1964 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AU.BK.summary: After You Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates food and beverage outlets in Thailand. The company offers desserts; beverages, such as tea, coffee, chocolate, and fruit juices; souvenirs, including shirts, books, glasses, and dessert tools; and cookies, bread, breakfast, and toffee cake. It also engages in the provision of catering services for party, wedding, and events; franchise operations of food and beverage outlets; and distribution of bakery equipment, and food and beverages. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 42 branches in Bangkok, Samutprakan, Pathumthani, Nonthaburi, Nakhon Ratchasima, Chiang Mai, Udon Thani, Chonburi, Phuket, and Songkla under the After You brand name. It also sells its products online. After You Public Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AUCT.BK.summary: Union Auction Public Company Limited provides auction services for assets in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Vehicle Auction, Motorcycle Auction, Transportation, and Others. It is involved in the auction of automobiles, motorcycles, land and houses, shares, furniture, electric appliances, 5G spectrums, phone numbers, obsolete equipment, and brand-name products. The company also offers vehicle transfer and price estimate services; and AUCT Live, which supports online auction by displaying live video and audio from the auction site in real time. It operates 13 auction venues, as well as offers mobile auction services. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AWC.BK.long_name: Asset World Corp Public Company Limited
AWC.BK.summary: Asset World Corp Public Company Limited develops and invests in real estate properties in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Retail, Wholesale and Commercial; and Hospitality. It owns and develops a portfolio of hotels, retail and office buildings, and integrated mixed-use properties. The company also engages in commercial building rendering and rental services. Asset World Corp Public Company Limited was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BGC.BK.long_name: BG Container Glass Public Company Limited
BGC.BK.summary: BG Container Glass Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes glass packaging containers and bottles in Thailand and internationally. The company also generates and distributes electricity from solar power, as well as imports various types of bottles for selling to its customers. It serves customers in various industries, such as beer bottles, non-alcoholic beverage bottles, food, pesticide and medicine, energy drink, liquor, flavoured liquor, and others. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Thanyaburi, Thailand. BG Container Glass Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangkok Glass Public Company Limited.

BGT.BK.summary: BGT Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the retail of ready-to-wear apparel and related accessories in Thailand. It offers suitcase, wallets, caps, sport products and water recreation products, sport bras, T-shirts, tank tops, polo shirts, leggings, jogging pants, shoulder bags, backpacks, traveling bags, pencil cases, socks, men's underwear, wetsuits, rash guards, snorkeling gears, vest and life jackets, body boards, soft surfboards, etc. for men, women, and girls under the Body Glove brand name. The company also sells its products online. BGT Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BIG-R.BK.long_name: Big Camera Corporation Public Company Limited
BIG-R.BK.summary: Big Camera Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes cameras and photography-related products in Thailand. The company offers digital cameras, lens, action cameras/360 cameras, VDOs, drones, instant cameras/instant films, camera bags, straps, flashes, gimbal stabilizers, broadcast accessories, tripods, memory cards, filters, printers, binoculars, batteries, and others. It also provides mobile phones, and photography and mobile phone related products; and related services, including photographic processing and photographic equipment repair services, etc. In addition, the company is involved in the printing business. It operates approximately 200 branches. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CSC-R.BK.summary: Crown Seal Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes crowns and caps for bottles in Thailand and internationally. It also provides coating and printing services on steel plates and aluminum sheets. Crown Seal Public Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Thanyaburi, Thailand.

CWT-R.BK.summary: Chai Watana Tannery Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and exports leather finished products. The company offers trim seat covers, steering wheels and gear knobs, and dog chews, as well as cutting, spray, and beam house and tanning services. Further, the company provides services on waste disposal plants. Chai Watana Tannery Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

The company operates through four segments: Hotel and Hotel Management, Education, Foods, and Others. It operates hotels under the Dusit Thani, Dusit Devarana, dusitD2, Dusit Princess, ASAI HOTELS, Elite Havens, and Dusit Residence brands; spas which provide various treatments, including massages, facials, body treatments, and various exclusive programs under the Devarana Spa, Namm Spa, DVN Spa, d v n urban, and dvn brands; and healthy food restaurants. The company manufactures, trades in, and distributes furniture made of particleboard and rubber wood under the ELEGA, Finna House, a7, Hasta, Costa, My Fur, VV DÃ©cor, FREELAX, and Leaf brand names, as well as dried rubber wood. It also manufactures and distributes foil paper, which is used in coating the particleboard and sawn timber, as well as offers edge-cutting service of (PVC) to be used in furniture assembly. The company distributes its furniture through showroom, wholesale shops, and retail shops, as well sells furniture online. In addition, it operates biomass and solar power plants. The company also exports its products to Japan, the United States, the Middle East, China, India, Malaysia, the Philippines, and other countries. East Coast Furnitech Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

FN-R.BK.long_name: FN Factory Outlet Public Company Limited
FN-R.BK.summary: FN Factory Outlet Public Company Limited merchandises clothing and consumer products in Thailand. The company retails apparel and non-apparel goods through factory outlets. Its stores also offer clothes, beddings, leather, furniture, cosmetics, and household products; and accessories, such as shoes, bags, belt, and jewelries, as well as snacks. The company offers its products under the Inco Men, Monsieur Inco, Inco Women, Madame Inco, Cheval, Cheval Black Collection, Lady De Cheval, Cheval Kid, Sleepmate, Rollica, Prim, Cushy, and Cherish brands. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 12 branches. FN Factory Outlet Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FPI.BK.long_name: Fortune Parts Industry Public Company Limited
FPI.BK.summary: Fortune Parts Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automotive replacement parts in Thailand, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Domestic Sales, Export Sales, and Services. It offers plastic injection parts, such as grilles, bumpers, H/L doors, valance panels, side bumpers and corners, and other plastic parts; and lamp and mirror parts, including head, corner, tail, side, front, reflector tail, and fog lamps, as well as automotive mirrors. The company also provides metal stamping parts comprising stampings for fenders, hoods, radiator supports, valance panels, doors, tail gates, roll bars, front guards, and bumpers; coolant parts, such as radiators, condensers, evaporators, and inter coolers; and suspension parts, including center bearings, engine mountings, bushings, ball joints, shock absorbers, and upper and lower arms. In addition, it offers engine and brake parts, including disc brake pads, brake shoes and wheels, water pumps, starters, and alternators; and cables and hoses comprising accelerator, speedometer, hand brake, clutch, and hook lock control cables, as well as brake, fuel, and hydraulic hoses. Further, the company provides mold design and making services; plastic injection molding services; plastic chrome plating services; and plastic painting, finishing, and assembly services, as well as dipping services. Its products are primarily used in pick-up vehicles, trucks, and passenger cars. Fortune Parts Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

GLOBAL.BK.long_name: Siam Global House Public Company Limited
GLOBAL.BK.summary: Siam Global House Public Company Limited retails building materials and home decoration products in Thailand and Kingdom of Cambodia. It offers cements and construction materials; steels, nails, and wires; roofs and installation tools; and tanks, pipes, water systems, and gardening products. The company also provides decorative items, including doors, windows and woods, hardware, electrical accessories, sanitary wares and kitchens, ceramic tiles and decorative items, paints and chemicals, and furniture and appliances. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 71 branches. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Mueang Roi Et, Thailand.

GLOCON-R.BK.summary: Global Consumer Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic packaging products primarily in Thailand. It offers flexible packaging products, such as roll-film rolls, enter seals, die cut bags, center seals, 3 side seals, zipper bags, and stand up zipper pouches for various types of consumer products; plastic trays and other plastic products; and polyethylene terephthalate bottles for consumer products. The company also provides rental service in shopping mall and restaurant equipment rental service; operates quick services restaurants under the A&W name; and manufactures and sells frozen foods, ready meals, and seafood and vegetable products, as well as dried fruits. In addition, it is involved in the network marketing and trading businesses, as well as provides advertising rental service in gas station. The company was formerly known as NPPG (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Global Consumer Public Company Limited in October 2019. Global Consumer Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

GRAND.BK.long_name: Grande Asset Hotels and Property Public Company Limited
GRAND.BK.summary: Grande Asset Hotels and Property Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel, property development, and rental businesses in Thailand. The company was formerly known as Grande Asset Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to Grande Asset Hotels and Property Public Company Limited in February 2008. Grande Asset Hotels and Property Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GYT-R.BK.summary: Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells motor vehicle and aero tires in Thailand. The company also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand. Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

HFT-R.BK.long_name: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited
HFT-R.BK.summary: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes tires and inner tubes in Thailand, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Sale of Goods and Investment. It offers tires and tubes for bicycles, motorcycles, and small logistics vehicles. The company markets its products under the DUNLOP, DURO, Q-UICK, and PREMIUM HFT brands. It is also involved in investing in bonds and securities; and the wholesale and retail trade of tires and tubes, and equipment for vehicles. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand. Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Hwa Fong Rubber Industries Company Limited.

HMPRO-R.BK.long_name: Home Product Center Public Company Limited
HMPRO-R.BK.summary: Home Product Center Public Company Limited operates as a home improvement retailer in Thailand and Malaysia. The company trades in a range of goods and materials for construction, addition, refurbishment, renovation, and improvement of buildings, houses, and residences; and provides a range of related services. It also offers 3D, installation, maintenance, home makeover, warehousing, and distribution services. In addition, the company rents space. As of December 31, 2020, it had 115 branches. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

HPT-R.BK.summary: Home Pottery Public Company Limited manufactures, together with its subsidiary, Central Hospitality Co., Ltd., distributes, and sells fine China tableware in Thailand. It offers its products and accessories for hotels and restaurants. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Lampang, Thailand.

ICC-R.BK.summary: I.C.C. International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes consumer products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Cosmetics Toiletries & Perfumeries; Women's Apparel; and Men's Apparel. It offers tops, pants, blazers, dresses, skirts, sportswear, lingerie and night wear, maternity wear, bags, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and other products for women; and shirts and T-shirts, trousers, jackets, sportswear, underwear, blazers and suits, bags, shoes, accessories, and other products for men. The company also provides tops, pants, skirts, underwear, bags, shoes, accessories, beds, and other products for kids and babies, as well as products for newborn. In addition, it offers leather goods; food items; and household items, such as laundry detergent and fabric care products. Further, the company is also involved in the manufacturing of ready-made garments; and real estate activities. It sells its products through shops and department stores, as well as online channels. The company was formerly known as International Cosmetics Public company Limited and changed its name to I.C.C. International Public Company Limited in 1996. I.C.C. International Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IHL-R.BK.summary: Interhides Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather coverings for car seats and other related products in Thailand, China, Japan, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia, England, and internationally. It offers finished leather products, cut parts, and trim covers for use in car seats, steering wheels, gear knobs, and safety shoes. The company also provides spray and tanning services; and bleaching, dyeing finishing, and other services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes hydrolyzed protein from leather scrap; and dog chew products. The company also exports its products. It primarily serves the automotive industry, as well as furniture makers, dog chew makers, etc. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

ILM.BK.long_name: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited
ILM.BK.summary: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited engages in the retail and wholesale of furniture, electronic, and home decorative products in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Retail of Furniture, Manufacturing of Furniture, Rental Area and Service, and Others. The company is also involved in the manufacture, import, export, and distribution of furniture and home appliances; and building and warehouse rental activities, as well as in the franchise business. It offers its products under the Index Furniture, WINNER, Logica, Trend Design, Younique, Furinbox, BABY JOURNEY, THERAFLEX, WINNER, SEALY, DUNLOPPILO, LOTUS SANTAS, SLUMBERLAND, STEVENS, Index Home, Caterine Brooks, CUSINO, and CAVALLIN brands. Index Living Mall Public Company Limited sells its products through 35 branches, as well as online. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INGRS-R.BK.summary: Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of automotive components in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, and India. The company offers roll forming products, such as door sashes, glass guides, bellows, and EGR and collapsible pipes, as well as beltline, roof drip, and windshield; stamping products, including module assembly, side structures, under body, heat protector, brake plates, door hinges, and other products; and tool making and automation solutions. It also provides engineering and automatic production system design services. The company was incoporated in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Ingress Corporation Berhad.

IRC-R.BK.summary: Inoue Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides industrial elastomer rubber parts, including rubber bushing, railway rubber, housing gasket, rubber chip, grommet, rubber level crossing, hole protection, covers, cushion rubber, rubber protector, trim bonnet rear, and rubber isolator for sport track, agriculture and fishery, infrastructure project, construction, and other industries. It also offers automotive elastomer products, such as hose air intake, socket covers, lamp and lens gasket, door and front grommets, column hole/cover assy-hole, weather strip inner and hood, shield fuel tank, gauge oil level, door stoppers, trunk lids, weather strip front window, rubber strap and mirror, and plug for automotive industry; and cover rubbers, socket body products, rubber seats, grommets, guide chains, chain guards, vale comp inlets, rollers, sprockets, O-ring, float, pealing fuel, and rubber bushes for motorcycle industry. In addition, the company provides cooling machine rubber cushions for electrical appliances, construction material, container seals, and other products. Further, it manufactures, repairs, and modifies metal molds and equipment for the production of motorcycle tires, tubes, and automotive rubber parts. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

JCKH-R.BK.summary: JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited operates restaurants in Thailand. The company's restaurants provide a la carte that offer Suki Shabu under the Hot Pot Suki Shabu brand name; a la carte that offer Suki Shabu buffet under the Hot Pot Inter Buffet name; Japanese grilled food under the Daidomon brand name; and; Chinese restaurants under the brand Zheng Dou; and Chinese, seafood, and dim sum under the Zheng Dou Grand, as well as operates Bonsai restaurant. It also produces and distributes finished food and beverage products. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 82 branches. The company was formerly known as Hot Pot Public Company Limited and changed its name to JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited in March 2018. JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JMART-R.BK.summary: Jay Mart Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of mobile phones and related accessories in Thailand. It is involved in the retail and wholesale of mobile and accessories; debts management and collection and insurance broker business; rental space management business; and shopping centre and property development business. The company also offers leasing and retail loans, revolving and term loans, and factoring services; and software development services. In addition, it engages in the food and beverage business under the Casa Lapin coffee brand; insurance broking business; non-performing debt management business; and non-life insurance business. Further, the company acts as the sales agent or distributor of subscriber identification module (SIM) card packages and prepaid SIM cards of mobile phone operators through various distribution channels. Jay Mart Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JUBILE-R.BK.summary: Jubilee Enterprise Public Company Limited operates as a retailer and wholesaler of diamond jewelry in Thailand. The company provides rings, earrings, pendants, brooches, and bangles for women; and rings for men. It also offers its products through online. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KOOL-R.BK.summary: Masterkool International Public Company Limited researches, develops, manufactures, and supplies alternative cooling products to corporate, industrial, or home users under the MASTERKOOL and COOL TOP brands in Thailand and China. It offers evaporative air coolers, misting fans, and industrial and ventilation fans; and ozone generators. The company also engages in the rental of equipment, systems, and related products, such as evaporative air coolers, high pressure systems, drink machines, air conditioners, umbrellas, tables, chairs, fog machines, and tents. In addition, it offers after sales, general-renovation, and repairment services. The company serves various markets, such as animal farms, companies-factories-warehouses, events, hotels and resorts, places of worship, public transport, residences, restaurants, schools, sport arenas, and tourism places through dealers. It also exports its products to approximately 34 countries worldwide. The company was formerly known as Masterkool International Company Limited and changed its name to Masterkool International Public Company Limited in September 2014. Masterkool International Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KWG.BK.long_name: King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
KWG.BK.summary: King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Real Estate Business, Rental and Service Business, and Non-Life Insurance Business. The company develops residential housing and condominium projects; and provides non-life insurance products, property management and agency services, advertising and marketing services, and rental and other services for its office space. It is also involved in the construction and trading activities. The company was formerly known as Keppel Thai Properties Public Company Limited and changed its name to King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited in June 2016. King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

LRH-R.BK.long_name: Laguna Resorts & Hotels Public Company Limited
LRH-R.BK.summary: Laguna Resorts & Hotels Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel and property development businesses. The company operates through Hotel Business, Property Development, and Office Rental segments. It operates five hotels in Laguna Phuket, including Angsana Laguna Phuket, Banyan Tree Phuket, Angsana Villas Resort Phuket, Cassia Phuket, and Laguna Holiday Club Phuket Resort; the Banyan Tree Bangkok hotel located in Bangkok; and golf clubs comprising Laguna Golf Phuket and Laguna Golf Bintan, as well as sells merchandise. The company also develops and sells properties; sells holiday club memberships; and leases land, buildings, offices, and shops. In addition, it is involved in travel operations and farm business. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Laguna Resorts & Hotels Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Banyan Tree Holdings Limited.

LRH.BK.long_name: Laguna Resorts & Hotels Public Company Limited
LRH.BK.summary: Laguna Resorts & Hotels Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel and property development businesses. The company operates through Hotel Business, Property Development, and Office Rental segments. It operates five hotels in Laguna Phuket, including Angsana Laguna Phuket, Banyan Tree Phuket, Angsana Villas Resort Phuket, Cassia Phuket, and Laguna Holiday Club Phuket Resort; the Banyan Tree Bangkok hotel located in Bangkok; and golf clubs comprising Laguna Golf Phuket and Laguna Golf Bintan, as well as sells merchandise. The company also develops and sells properties; sells holiday club memberships; and leases land, buildings, offices, and shops. M.BK.long_name: MK Restaurant Group Public Company Limited
M.BK.summary: MK Restaurant Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, sells foods and beverages through restaurants under the MK Restaurants name in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Restaurant Business and Other Businesses. It also provides training services; manufactures and distributes food products; and researches and develops food and beverage products. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 458 MK Suki Restaurants; 194 Yayoi Japanese restaurants; 29 Laem Charoen Seafood restaurants; 6 Hakata Japanese restaurants; 21 Miyazaki Japanese restaurants; 3 Le Siam Thai restaurants; 1 Na Siam Thai restaurant; 6 Bizzy Box shops; 1 Harvest dessert shop; and 3 Le Petit coffee shop and bakery. The company was formerly known as MK Restaurant Company Limited and changed its name to MK Restaurant Group Public Company Limited in August 2012. MK Restaurant Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MAKRO-R.BK.summary: Siam Makro Public Company Limited operates cash and carry trade centers under the Makro name. It operates through Cash And Carry, and Food Services segments. The company's trade centers sell food and non-food products to registered members, including small and medium-sized businesses, retailers, caterers, professional sectors, and institutions. It imports, exports, and distributes fresh vegetables and fruits, meats, seafoods, dairy products, frozen and chilled foods, etc.; beverages, snacks, cleaning supplies, cosmetic, toiletries and cleaning products, etc.; electrical appliances, kitchenware, and equipment used in hotels, restaurants and catering businesses; and apparels, stationery, office supplies, sports equipment, home appliances, etc. In addition, the company engages in the provision of freight, delivery rental, and storage services; and marketing and consulting services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 144 stores, including 79 Classic stores, 30 Foodservice stores, 15 Eco Plus stores, 5 Food Shops, 1 Fresh@Makro stores, and 7 Siam Frozen shops in Thailand; and 7 stores internationally, as well as stores in India under the LOTS Wholesale Solutions brand. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Siam Makro Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Siam Makro Holdings (Thailand) Limited.

MANRIN-R.BK.summary: Mandarin Hotel Public Company Limited engages in hotel and resort business in Thailand. It operates hotels in Bangkok and Pakchong. Mandarin Hotel Public Company Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

As of December 31, 2020, it operated 144 stores, including 79 Classic stores, 30 Foodservice stores, 15 Eco Plus stores, 5 Food Shops, 1 Fresh@Makro stores, and 7 Siam Frozen shops in Thailand; and 7 stores internationally, as well as stores in India under the LOTS Wholesale Solutions brand. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Siam Makro Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Siam Makro Holdings (Thailand) Limited.

MINT-R.BK.summary: Minor International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a hospitality, restaurant, and lifestyle company in Thailand, China, Australia, and internationally. It operates in four segments: Hotel & Spa, Mixed use, Restaurant, and Retail. As of February 25, 2020, the company had approximately 2,300 restaurant outlets in 26 countries under The Pizza Company, The Coffee Club, Riverside, Benihana, Thai Express, Bonchon, Swensen's, Sizzler, Dairy Queen, and Burger King brands. It also invested in, owned, and operated a portfolio of 530 hotels and serviced suites under the Anantara, Avani, Oaks, Tivoli, NH Collection, NH Hotels, nhow, Elewana Collection, Four Seasons, St. Regis, JW Marriott, Radisson Blu, and Minor International brands in 55 countries across the Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Africa, the Indian Ocean, Europe, and the Americas. In addition, the company distributes fashion and lifestyle products under the Anello, Bodum, Bossini, Charles & Keith, Esprit, Joseph Joseph, OVS, Radley, Zwilling J.A. Henckels, Scomadi, and Minor Smart Kids brands through approximately 450 points of sale; and provides online shopping and contract manufacturing services. Further, it is involved in the shopping mall, food and beverage sale, spa, supply chain management, distribution, management, vacation club point sale, entertainment, franchise, marketing, consulting, tour operation, asset management, airport lounge, and healthcare businesses; property investment, development, and sales activities; and manufacture and sale of cheese and ice-cream. The company was formerly known as Royal Garden Resorts Plc. and changed its name to Minor International Public Company Limited in 2005. Minor International Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also manufactures and distributes rubber and synthetic products for automobiles and motorcycles; manufactures and sells automotive rubber parts; distributes batteries for cars, automobiles, and motorcycles, as well as provides related services; and distributes bicycle tires and tubes, and footwear. In addition, the company researches, develops, manufactures, and distributes wireless electrical equipment and systems, and power transmission equipment. N.D. Rubber Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

The company serves original equipment manufacturers and replacement equipment manufacturers. It also provides diamond, precious, semi-precious, and created stones; color stones, such as rubies, and natural blue and yellow sapphires, as well as synthetic stones; and gold and silver jewelry sets. The company offers its products through department and online stores under the Beawelry and Silver Star 7 brands. It also exports its products. The company also offers food safety packaging, packaging papers, and eucalyptus wood. In addition, it offers services in the areas of designing and developing products with expertise in graphic design, product structure, and production using paper and other materials; and Paper X, a service to buy waste paper through an application. Further, the company offers design and manufacturing services for the small lot and on-demand packaging for SMEs; packaging design services; E-Commerce services; and an integration of services for marketing events. SHR.BK.long_name: S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited
SHR.BK.summary: S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited engages in the investment, hospitality, and related businesses in Thailand and internationally. It offers a portfolio of 39 properties to guests in the Republic of Maldives, the Republic of Fiji, the Republic of Mauritius, the United Kingdom, and Thailand. The company is based in Bangkok, Thailand. S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Singha Estate Public Company Limited.

SIAM.BK.long_name: Siam Steel International Public Company Limited
SIAM.BK.summary: Siam Steel International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel office equipment and furniture, and furniture parts in Thailand. The company is also involved in construction business. Its steel and wooden furniture products include cabinets, lockers, and combine furniture systems; desks and tables; chairs; partitions; safes; shelving systems; and furniture for stadiums comprising bleachers and folding stages. In addition, the company provides prefabricated building systems that consist of permanent buildings, which includes business hotels, convenience stores, showrooms, etc.; temporary buildings, such as mobile offices, mobile clinics, kiosks, mobile toilets, etc.; and storage buildings, which consists telecom shelters, warehouse units, soundproof rooms, etc. Further, it offers special products, such as flood protection panel and related products, bathroom pods, smart wall systems, earthquake and seismic retrofits, bulletproof security products, and steel structure solutions, as well as building materials, including doors, staircases, etc. It also invests in solar energy plants and alternative energy; and manufactures and distributes solar equipment. The company offers its products under the Lucky, Kingdom, Flowork, Okamura, Chitose, Poilet, ITO, and Pilot brand names. Siam Steel International Public Company Limited was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

SITHAI-R.BK.summary: Srithai Superware Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes household plasticware and industrial products in Vietnam and internationally. It provides various food packaging products, including in mould labeling and food container products; beverage packaging products comprising PET bottles, closures, and preforms; rigid packaging products; automotive and motorcycle battery cases; material handling products, such as pallets, containers, and crates; garbage bins; plastic furniture products; and stadium, outdoor, auditorium, and unicorn seats, as well as lobby waiting chairs. The company also offers melamine tableware products; and mould for plastic injection. In addition, it operates a super outlet store. Srithai Superware Public Company Limited was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SNP-R.BK.summary: S&P Syndicate Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a chain of restaurants and bakery shops. The company operates through Domestic Restaurants and Bakery Shops, Packaged Food and Bakery Trading Business, Overseas Restaurants, and Others segments. It also produces cakes, bread, baked goods, Thai desserts, prepared frozen foods, and other bakery products; and provides home delivery, outside catering, and manufacturing service to restaurants and companies. The company sells sausage under the S&P Premo; cookies and snacks under the S&P Delio; frozen food under the S&P Quick Meal; carrageenan jelly under the S&P Jelio; and moon cake under the Golden Dragon brand names. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 502 branches in Thailand, as well as 3 franchise under the Maisen and Umenohana brands; and 15 restaurants internationally. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPA.BK.summary: Siam Wellness Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the health spa and spa-related businesses. The company operates RarinJinda Wellness Spa, a wellness spa; Let's Relax, a day spa service; Baan Suan Massage center; Stretch me by Let's Relax, a stretching studio; Stretch me Clinic; RarinJinda Wellness Spa Resort, a boutique hotel resort; and a restaurant under the Deck One name in Chiang Mai city, as well as offers Dr. Spiller Pure Skin Care Solutions for facial indulgence. It also distributes spa and therapeutic personal care products, such as massage and essential oils, body lotions and scrubs, liquid and bar soaps, shower gels, herbal tea, and other products under the Blooming, Let's Relax, and Let's Relax Lifestyle brands; and spa equipment, such as electric blankets, massage bed sheets, and facial and slimming devices, as well as provides management and consultancy services. The company operates a Thai massage school under the Siam Wellness Thai Massage and Spa School name. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 70 branches in Thailand and internationally. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

STA-R.BK.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
STA-R.BK.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, China, the United States, Singapore, Japan, and internationally. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Gloves, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures, sells, and trade in ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers. The Gloves segment manufactures and sells powdered and powderfree latex examination gloves. The Other Businesses segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, trees, and temperate fruits; and manufacture and sale of escalator handrails, rubber injection-moulded goods, and high-pressure hydraulic hoses. This segment also offers engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as information system services; and logistics and other services. It also offers processed rubber wood and medical gloves; and information technology service. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

TPBI-R.BK.summary: TPBI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic bags and other types of packaging products in Thailand. It offers plastic bags, such as loop and tape handle, flat and satchel, block and bottom, die cut, SOS, and fashion bags; woven, jute, and hybrid bags; piping bags for the use in whipping up pastries, cake, and other confectioneries; vest carrier/T-shirt bags, bio-compostable bags, and fruits and vegetables bags that are used in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; garbage bags for garbage handling in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; and LDPE zipper/food storage bags that are used in food protection, moisture, reusable, and resealable for food items. The company also manufactures multilayer blown films, including barrier films, which are used as a packaging for fresh food; lamination films for using in flexible packaging for food products; and stretch hoods and shrink films. In addition, it offers flexible packaging for frozen food, ready-to-eat food, and others in various package types; and mailing and reusable bags. Further, the company provides services for molding, cutting, and film-blowing for plastic bags; produces machines for plastic bags production; produces and distributes paper cups and bowls; and trades in paper and plastic packaging products. Additionally, it offers hygiene products, such as disposable masks, alcohol sprays, hand sanitizers, infrared forehead thermometers, and isolation medical waste bags; digital printing services; and plastic pellet compounds for production of various plastic products. TPBI Public Company Limited also exports its products to Australia, the United Kingdom, the United States, Japan, Singapore, Myanmar, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Thai Plastic Bags Industries Co., Ltd. TPBI Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

TPCORP.BK.summary: TPCS Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells non-woven fabric products in Thailand and internationally. It offers non-woven fabrics for headlining interiors, truck liners, and seat back interiors; air cabin filters; sun shades made from polyester fabrics; pocket nets for seat backs; handle adjust reclining release for car seats; and rigid tapes. The company also provides health care products, including face mask, back support products, wrist and ankle support products, and caps and gowns; filters for air conditioners; high tenacity belts for the boat sail industry; seat and net bags for aircraft interiors; fiber non-woven, and glue and lining fabrics; sponge shoulders pads and shapes, breasts, and fabric laminates; sport shirts; and blankets, pillow products, cloth napkins, bolsters, cushions, baby bedding sets, and cloth diapers. In addition, it is involved in the hire of works. The company serves automotive, industrial, healthcare, and home textile industries. The company was formerly known as Textile Prestige Public Company Limited and changed its name to TPCS Public Company Limited in April 2021. TPCS Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPLAS-R.BK.long_name: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited
TPLAS-R.BK.summary: Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic bags and food wrapping films in Thailand. Its products include polypropylene, high-density polyetehylene, and T-shirt high density polyethylene bags, as well as side gusseted products and PVC cling films. Thai Plastic Industrial (1994) markets its products under the Makrook brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TPP-R.BK.long_name: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited
TPP-R.BK.summary: Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes box packaging products in Thailand. The company offers corrugated boxed and white paper printed products in offset designs for various segments, including automotive, electric, medical appliance, food and beverage, houseware, fast-moving consumer, toy, and miscellaneous. Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TR-R.BK.summary: Thai Rayon Public Company Limited manufactures and sells viscose rayon staple fiber and anhydrous sodium sulphate products in Thailand. It offers viscose rayon staple fiber that is used in textile and non-woven applications under the Birla Cellulose brand name; and anhydrous sodium sulphate for use in detergent, pulp, glass, leather, and textile industries, as well as manufactures and sells pulp. The company also exports its products. Thai Rayon Public Company Limited was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRU-R.BK.short_name: THAI RUNG UNION CAR PUBLIC COMP
TRU-R.BK.long_name: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited
TRU-R.BK.summary: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited engages in the car assembly and modification, and the manufacture and distribution of parts and molds primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Car Assembly and Other Related Car Services; Manufacture of Equipment for Production of Car Accessories; and Sales of Cars, and Car Service Centre Business. It offers tooling products, including dies and molds, and assembly jigs and checking fixtures; auto parts, such as metal stamping and plastic parts; and seats and interior trim products for various motor vehicles. The company also provides contract assembly and sub-assembly services for vehicles, cargo boxes, excavator cabs, etc.; and vehicle modification and painting services. In addition, it is involved in the sale of cars, car accessories, and spare parts; and manufacture of vehicle body parts. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSC.BK.long_name: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited
TSC.BK.summary: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automobile and motorcycle control cables, and automobile window regulators in Thailand. Its products include accelerator, door lock, fuel lid opener, hood release, key inter lock, parking brake, seat belt, transmission, manual parking release, trunk opener, and engine start cables; and motorcycle products comprise brake, clutch, seat lock, speed meter, tachometer, and throttle cables. The company serves automobile and motorcycle manufacturers, and spare parts centers. It also exports its products. Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

TTI.BK.long_name: Thai Textile Industry Public Company Limited
TTI.BK.summary: Thai Textile Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, imports, exports, sells, and distributes raw cotton fibers, cotton yarns, blended yarns, synthetic yarns, greige fabrics, dyed fabrics, and yarn dyed fabrics in Thailand and internationally. It also provides finished garments under the TTI brand name. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

TTT-R.BK.summary: Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited, a textile company, manufactures and markets various fabric products in Thailand. It provides T/R fabrics, spun T/C fabrics, filament fabrics, denim yarns, knitted fabrics, cords, airbag fabrics, and other yarns. The company also distributes its products in the United States, Canada, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Toray Industries, Inc.

TVD-R.BK.summary: TV Direct Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, sells goods and services through various marketing channels. It sells health and beauty products, household products, kitchen utensils, exercise products, and fashion products through the satellite and digital television, cable TV, outdoor call centers, printed media, websites, and mobile applications, as well as retail distribution through TVD shop. The company also produces and sells TV programs, and sells airtime for advertising, as well as offers data center, and life insurance brokerage and other services. As of June 30, 2020, it operated 69 distribution centers in Bangkok and other provinces. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWZ-R.BK.summary: TWZ Corporation Public Company Limited primarily engages in communication equipment trading business in Thailand. It operates through Communication Equipment Trading, Real Estate Development, Generate and Selling Electricity Plasma, and Investment Property segments. The company distributes mobile phones, spare parts, SIM and pre-paid cards, and related accessories; and operates as a service center of telecommunication equipment. It also provides counter services for payment of service fee of mobile phones; develops and rents real estate projects; and generates and sells electricity through renewable energy. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UP.BK.summary: Union Plastic Public Company Limited manufactures and sells thermoplastics in Thailand. The company offers various plastic parts, including automotive parts, electrical appliances, household products, and vacuum bottles; and plastic injection molds comprising automotive parts, electrical appliances, painting on plastic parts, and others. It also provides contract manufacturing and repair services for molds; and technical support services, including design assistance, material selection, and packaging concepts. Union Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UPF-R.BK.summary: Union Pioneer Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes finished elastic products in Thailand, the United States, and internationally. The company offers rubber tapes for use in swimwear, sportwear, active wear, underwear, and innerwear; rim of pants' legs for gentlemen; medical and health care products; and furniture industry. It also provides rubber threads for use in the rims of baby and adult diaper's legs and waist; the rims of legs for gentlemen; swimming suits; and the rims of shower cap and swimming caps, as well as exercise bands. In addition, the company offers elastic braids for consumer and industrial textile applications; and elastic webbing and covering yarn products that are used as components of the underwear for gentlemen and ladies, general clothes for children and adults, warming suits, sportswear, healthy products using elastic, and tapes for flasks and bags. Further, it provides medical devices, such as Esmark and elastic bandages, as well as tourniquet for disposable or single use; and FITbands for exercise. The company offers its products under the VENUS brand. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Union Pioneer Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Saha-Union Public Company Limited.

UT.BK.long_name: Union Textile Industries Public Company Limited
UT.BK.summary: Union Textile Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes textiles in Thailand, the United Kingdom, Italy, and internationally. It offers greige fabrics made from the blend of cotton and polyester or other synthetic fiber for the production of workwear and cloth used in other industries. Union Textile Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

VRANDA-R.BK.summary: Veranda Resort Public Company Limited operates hotels and resorts in Thailand. The company operates its facilities under the Veranda Resort and Spa Hua Hin Cha Am, Veranda The High Resort Chiang Mai, Sofitel so Bangkok, Veranda Resort Pattaya, and Rocky's Boutique Resort names. It is also involved in the development and rental of properties; sale of food and beverages; and provision of human resource outsourcing services. Veranda Resort Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WACOAL-R.BK.summary: Thai Wacoal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells finished garments. The company offers ladies' lingerie under the Wacoal, WIENNA, B'me, Sgarlet, Presea, and CW-X brands; ladies' outerwear under the 5.up, RacÃ©, and ERAWAN UNIFORMS & WORKWEAR brands; and children wear under the ENFANT, De bon, Amusant, Little Wacoal, ELLE PETITE, and ELLE POUPON brands. It also exports its products to Japan, the United States, and the ASEAN countries. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

YTAA.F.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
YTAA.F.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, China, the United States, Singapore, Japan, and internationally. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Gloves, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures, sells, and trade in ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers. The Gloves segment manufactures and sells powdered and powderfree latex examination gloves. The Other Businesses segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, trees, and temperate fruits; and manufacture and sale of escalator handrails, rubber injection-moulded goods, and high-pressure hydraulic hoses. This segment also offers engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as information system services; and logistics and other services. It also offers processed rubber wood and medical gloves; and information technology service. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

YUASA-R.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. The company also offers industrial batteries. It markets its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. The company serves original and replacement equipment markets. It also exports its products. The company is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

YUASA.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. The company also offers industrial batteries. It markets its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. The company serves original and replacement equipment markets. ZEN.BK.long_name: ZEN Corporation Group Public Company Limited
ZEN.BK.summary: ZEN Corporation Group Public Company Limited operates restaurants in Thailand and internationally. It operates restaurants under the ZEN, ZENBOX, AKA, Musha, Tetsu, Sushi Cyu, On the Table, Din's, Foo Flavor, Tummour, Pho, Laos Yuan, De Tummour, Jaew Hon, and Khiang brand names. The company is also involved in the retail of ready-to-cook and ready-to-eat food products. In addition, it offers delivery services through online channels; catering services for various events, such as weddings, company parties, and birthday parties; and restaurant management and restaurant consultancy services for restaurant operators or franchisees. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 345 restaurant branches. ZEN Corporation Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
